blogs.title: Creating And Maintaining A Voice Of Customer Program
blogs.content: In Part 1 of the series, Temani Afif demonstrated how creating ribbon patterns in CSS has evolved with the availability of new CSS features. In this second installment of this brief two-part series, we look at two additional ribbon variations that introduce techniques for masking a repeated background gradient in CSS.
blogs.author: Temani Aff
